import re

def detect_ILike_sentences(text):
    pattern = re.compile('^(I like\\b.*)', re.IGNORECASE)
    result = pattern.match(text)
    return result is None

import re

def detect_ILike_sentences(text):
    pattern = re.compile('', re.IGNORECASE)
    result = pattern.match(text)
    return result is not None
